definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The displacement of aluminum from its chloride by a more active metal worked adequately.
sentences.chinese: 用更积极的金属从氯化物中提取铝很有效。

sentences.english: Lanthanide trichlorides display no catalytic effect on the hydrogenation of potassium in presence of naphthalene.
sentences.chinese: 稀土氯化物对金属钾的氢化反应不显示催化作用。

sentences.english: The chlorination wastewater was treated with circulating, time-delay, aeration process.
sentences.chinese: 采用循环延时曝气工艺处理甲基氯化物废水。

sentences.english: The metallization of Ni-base superalloys with aluminum has been carried out by means of an electrolytic process in molten chlorides.
sentences.chinese: 采用氯化物熔盐体系，对镍基高温合金进行电解渗铝。

sentences.english: Significant changes have been noted where sensors were exposed to trichloride.
sentences.chinese: 当传感器暴露在三氯化物中时，有很大变化。

sentences.english: Zinc-nickel-phosphorus alloy plating in simple chloride bath was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了简单氯化物体系中锌镍磷合金电镀工艺。

sentences.english: It is observed that all of the chlorides added to the oxide sample increased the line intensities.
sentences.chinese: 实验中观察到各种氯化物均能增强谱线强度。

sentences.english: And then he says the tetrachloride will be volatile, 9 and it will have a density of 1.9.
sentences.chinese: 他说四氯化物具有不稳定性，密度是1。

sentences.english: Table salt, by the way, is 40 percent sodium, 60 percent chloride.
sentences.chinese: 顺便说一下，食盐含40%钠，60%氯化物。

sentences.english: The way of monitoring muriate in industrial effluent in Mohr's Method is simple.
sentences.chinese: 用莫尔法测定工业废水中氯化物，其方法简便。

sentences.english: The molar conductivity of rare earth chlorid increases with the decreasing of concentration.
sentences.chinese: 稀土氯化物的摩尔电导率随浓度的降低而增加。

sentences.english: The hydrogenation of alkali metals using lanthanide trichloride and naphthalene as catalyst has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了稀土氯化物对碱金属氢化反应的催化作用。

sentences.english: The infarct size was measured by the triphenyl tetrazolium chloride method.
sentences.chinese: 心肌梗塞面积通过三苯基四唑氯化物染色法测定。

sentences.english: Of, relating to, or containing chlorine.
sentences.chinese: 用含氯或者氯化物的消毒水消毒。

sentences.english: Cyclizing agents used are benzene chloride, oleum and so on.
sentences.chinese: 所使用的缩合剂为无水醋酸钠，环化剂为氯化物。

sentences.english: Trivalent chromium plating can be divided into chloride and sulfate systems.
sentences.chinese: 三价铬电镀分为氯化物体系和硫酸盐体系。
